text:
Hey all!
I've got a module that has a local copy of slick slider attached via the module, see image. I believe FireFox is blocking these request due to a missing "Sec-Fetch-Site: cross-site" header. Is this expected, or do we have a work around.

<@U024L8W0MB6> might this be related to the hubdb front end issue we discovered yesterday?

Following up here, it seems that the files went missing in HS and were not caused by the header issue.

This is the second time we've seen this happen with slick slider, in a different portal. Has anyone else experienced this lately?
